about_the_game:
• Build your base

    You are on a mission! Be the one to tame this planet. Build your base, defend it, automate it. Who wouldn't want to live on a hostile planet?
    You will need energy to make your machines work and while coal has never failed us, too much pollution might cause problems.


  • Explore and avoid dangers

    Take pictures of the fauna and flora to learn more about their behavior.

    Utopiq INC. is not responsible for any issues related to injuries, property damage, or tampering with wildlife and other extinction of endangered species. Injuries can include, but are not limited to, cuts, bruises, bone fractures, second and third degree burns, frostbite, poisoning, limb loss, asphyxia, damage at a subatomic level.



  • Have fun with other players

    In case robots aren't enough for you and the loneliness starts to drive you crazy, you can visit this planet in a group. Explore and build with your friends. The more, the merrier!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Utopiq, INC. Planet Tourism Program!Embark on an adventure to build your base, and ensure the planet is habitable for humanity. Document the diverse fauna and flora... even if sometimes, ignorance is bliss!
